name: Galactic Escape (itch) (James Bourassa)
description:
Now with fancy transition screens! Escape the asteroids and aliens trying to destroy your cargo in this top-down bullet hell shooter. After a while, they get pretty aggressive...

Use the mouse to aim, click or press to fire, and move with the WASD keys.

This project uses assets and modified scripts from Michigan State University and original scripts by James Bourassa (that's me).
